author: Geoffrey Morgan
title: Why did oil plunge 306% in a day? U.S. crude descends into negative territory in technical crash — but ‘nobody’s selling’
description: Brace yourself for a highly volatile trading week
content: CALGARY North American oil traders witnessed a total and historic collapse into negative territory for West Texas Intermediate oil prices on Monday, and braced for extreme volatility for the rest of the week as the commodity reacts to weakening global demand … [+5745 chars]
